TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute extends System.Attribute implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior
Public NotInheritable Class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute Inherits Attribute Implements IServiceBehavior
public ref class AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute sealed : Attribute, System::ServiceModel::Description::IServiceBehavior

summary.span: Appliqué à un service Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) pour indiquer si ce service peut être exécuté en mode de compatibilité ASP.NET.

span.span: Applied to a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service to indicate whether that service can be run in ASP.NET compatibility code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Appliqué à une classe d'implémentation de service, cet attribut indique si ce service requiert ou prend en charge le mode de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] à activer pour le domaine d'application d'hébergement (AppDomain).When applied to a service implementation class, this attribute indicates whether this service requires or supports [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode to be enabled for the hosting application domain (AppDomain). Les AppDomains qui hébergent des services [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] peuvent s'exécuter dans deux modes d'hébergement différents:AppDomains hosting [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services can run in two different hosting modes: - Mode de transport mixte (valeur par défaut) : dans ce mode, les services [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] ne participent pas au pipeline HTTP [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].Mixed Transports Mode (Default): In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services do not participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline. Cela garantit qu'un service [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] se comporte de manière cohérente, indépendamment de l'environnement d'environnement et du transport.This guarantees that a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] service behaves consistently, independent of hosting environment and transport. - Mode de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] : dans ce mode, les services [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] participent au pipeline HTTP [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] d'une manière similaire aux services ASMX.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] Compatibility Mode: In this mode, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services participate in the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] HTTP pipeline in a manner similar to ASMX services. Les fonctionnalités [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] telles que l'autorisation de fichier, l'autorisation d'URL et l'état de session HTTP sont applicables aux services [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] qui s'exécutent dans ce mode.[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] features such as File Authorization, UrlAuthorization, and HTTP Session State are applicable to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services running in this mode. Le mode d'hébergement est contrôlé par l'indicateur de configuration d'application `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` :The hosting mode is controlled by the application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. `` `` `` Cet indicateur a la valeur `false` par défaut et les services [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] sont donc exécutés en mode de transports mixte sauf si vous optez explicitement pour le mode de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].This flag is `false` by default and thus [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services run in the Mixed Transports Mode unless you explicitly opt into the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] mode de compatibilité, voir [ <serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode, see [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). Pour ce faire, utilisez la propriété .Use the property to do this. Pendant l'exécution, les applications peuvent détecter si le mode de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] est activé en vérifiant la valeur de la propriété statique.At runtime, applications can detect if [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples Les développeurs de service peuvent s’assurer que leur service est uniquement exécuté en Mode de compatibilité ASP.NET en définissant le propriété sur le à comme indiqué dans l’exemple suivantService developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the property on the to as shown in the following example [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode RequirementsMode { System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::Activation::AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode value); };

summary.span: Obtient ou définit le niveau de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] requis par le service.

span.span: Gets or sets the level of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility required by the service.

value.span: qui indique le degré requis de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] des services.

span.span: The that indicates the services required degree of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Utilisez la propriété pour définir le mode d'hébergement dans le code.Use the property to set the hosting mode in code. Cela peut également se faire en définissant un indicateur de configuration `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled` au niveau de l'application.This can also be done by setting an application-level configuration flag `aspNetCompatibilityEnabled`. [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). [<serviceHostingEnvironment>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/servicehostingenvironment.md). Pendant l'exécution, les applications peuvent détecter si le mode de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] est activé en vérifiant la valeur de la propriété statique.At runtime, applications can detect whether [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode is enabled by checking the value of the static property . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_AspNetCompatibility#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

summary.span: Ajoute des données personnalisées auxquelles les éléments de liaison peuvent accéder pour prendre en charge l’implémentation du contrat.

span.span: Adds custom data that the binding elements can access to support the implementation of the contract.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette méthode prend en charge l'infrastructure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] et n'est pas destinée à être directement utilisée à partir de votre code.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

summary.span: Vérifie si le type d'hébergement est cohérent avec les spécifications de compatibilité [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)].

span.span: Checks that the type of hosting is consistent with the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility requirements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cette méthode prend en charge l'infrastructure [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] et n'est pas destinée à être directement utilisée à partir de votre code.This method supports the [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
